notes: Very Large Online Platforms (45M+ EU users) have enhanced obligations including risk assessments and audits
Hosting services must implement notice-and-action, designate points of contact, report to authorities
Cloud services are hosting services under DSA; liability exemptions require no actual knowledge
CDN and caching services are intermediary services with conduit/caching liability rules
Internet access providers are mere conduit services with basic obligations
Online marketplaces must verify traders (KYBC), display product safety info, random compliance checks
Financial services themselves not in scope; but platforms offering financial products may be
DSA applies to intermediary services, not product manufacturers directly
